message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. Given its features and benefits, I'm offering it at a starting price of $13,500.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within a budget of $15,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $12,000?
Bob, I understand your desire to stay within budget.  While I value this product highly, I'm willing to come down to $12,800. This offer reflects a fair compromise, don't you think?
